title: Sold - FS: SGC 55 Piedmont Fact. 42 - Frank Smith

posts.post_title: Sold - FS: SGC 55 Piedmont Fact. 42 - Frank Smith
posts.post_content:
For sale a very nice SGC 55 Frank Smith (Chicago & Boston) with a difficult Piedmont Fact. 42 reverse. I'm asking (Sold), but will consider offers. Check or MO only.

Please email me with any questions - [url]mmw2161@aol.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=221358&d=1455547872[/IMG]

Thank you for your interest.

Jerry
Great find Jerry. Good luck with the sale and glad to see a good guy back on the boards !!

Beautiful card.
Looks like it's headed to Valdosta.:D

The card has been sold.

Thanks,
